short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the best of web without the distractions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take better control of how you spend time on the web with tinyWeb! 

tinyWeb removes the addictive UI elements from certain social media websites so that you can spend less time mindlessly clicking content

Currently in Beta with support for YouTube and Twitter, more features coming soon!
